DocAttribute.Name: Vertices
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of texture coordinate vertices that are applied to the corresponding points of the polyloop defining a face bound.

DocAttribute.Name: MappedTo
DocAttribute.Documentation: The face that defines the corresponding list of points along the bounding poly loop of the face outer bound. > NOTE  The face may have additional inner loops. The _IfcTextureMap_ and its _Vertices_ only correspond with the coordinates of the _IfcPolyloop_ representing the outer bound.
